author: anmenaga
body:
`Implicit remoting on restricted ISS.Error occurred in Describe block` :
1) Sometimes this test fails during setup in `beforeall` with unknown reason (noticed on Preview.5). Seems to be limited to `2016 - Elevated` only.
2) per recommendation from Jim, Pester-type checks should not be done in `beforeall` statements, so test should be updated.

# Steps to reproduce

Run release tests pipeline, specifically `2016 - Elevated`.
title: Stabilize test 'Implicit remoting on restricted ISS'
